_comment: Off-road features for scoring. Sources: manufacturer specs, enthusiast forums

4runner.note: TRD Pro: Multi-Terrain Select, Crawl Control, rear e-locker

4runner_ltd.note: Limited: Full-time 4WD with Torsen center diff

4runner_trd_orp.note: TRD Off-Road: Crawl control, rear e-locker, Multi-Terrain Select

runner_venture.note: Trailhunter: Old Man Emu suspension, ARB bumper, rear locker

4runner_5g_trd_pro.note: 5th Gen TRD Pro: Crawl control, A-TRAC, rear locker

4runner_5g_trd_or.note: 5th Gen TRD Off-Road: Rear locker, crawl control

gx.note: GX 550 Overtrail: Torsen center, e-locker rear, Crawl Control

gx460.note: GX 460: Torsen center diff, Crawl Control optional

lc.note: 2025 Land Cruiser: Torsen center, e-locker rear, Crawl Control

lc200.note: 200 Series: Full-time 4WD, center lock, rear locker available

lc100.note: 100 Series: Full-time 4WD with center and rear lockers

lc80.note: 80 Series: Triple-lockable (front, center, rear) on FZJ80

lx570.note: LX 570: Same as LC200, Torsen center, KDSS

sequoia.note: Sequoia TRD Pro: Multi-Terrain Select, rear e-locker

sequoia_ltd.note: Sequoia Limited: Full-time AWD, no low range

fj_cruiser.note: FJ Cruiser: Part-time 4WD, rear locker, A-TRAC, Crawl Control

defender.note: Defender V8: Terrain Response 2, center diff, electronic rear diff

defender_s.note: Defender S: Terrain Response 2, twin-speed transfer case

defender_classic.note: Classic Defender: Solid axles, center diff lock, optional rear locker

disco_lr4.note: LR4: Terrain Response, twin-speed transfer case

disco_5.note: Discovery 5: Terrain Response 2, twin-speed transfer case

rr_sport.note: Range Rover Sport: Terrain Response 2, air suspension

rr_full.note: Range Rover: Terrain Response 2, air suspension

gc4xe.note: GC 4xe Summit: Quadra-Drive II, electronic limited-slip rear

gc4xe_ol.note: GC 4xe Overland: Quadra-Trac II, limited-slip rear

gc_trailhawk.note: GC Trailhawk: Quadra-Drive II, e-limited slip rear, Selec-Speed

gc_wk2.note: WK2: Quadra-Trac II standard, limited slip available

gc_wk2_th.note: WK2 Trailhawk: Quadra-Drive II, electronic limited-slip

gwagoneer.note: Grand Wagoneer: Quadra-Drive II, 2-speed transfer case

wrangler_rubicon.note: Rubicon 4xe: Rock-Trac, Dana 44s, front/rear lockers, sway bar disconnect

wrangler_jl.note: JL Rubicon: Rock-Trac, Dana 44s, front/rear lockers, sway bar disconnect

wrangler_jk.note: JK Rubicon: Rock-Trac, Dana 44s, electronic lockers front/rear

wrangler_tj.note: TJ Rubicon: Dana 44s, lockers. Non-Rubicon has Dana 35/44

bronco.note: Bronco Badlands: G.O.A.T. modes, front/rear lockers, sway bar disconnect

bronco_ob.note: Bronco Outer Banks: Advanced 4x4, no lockers standard

bronco_raptor.note: Bronco Raptor: Advanced 4x4, front/rear lockers, Fox shocks

bronco_21_24.note: Bronco Badlands 2021-24: Same as current gen

expedition.note: Expedition Timberline: No low range, limited-slip rear

expedition_4g.note: Expedition 4th Gen: Intelligent 4WD, no low range

excursion.note: Excursion: Part-time 4WD, manual shift transfer case

tahoe_z71.note: Tahoe Z71: 2-speed transfer case, auto-locking rear diff

tahoe_5g.note: 5th Gen Tahoe Z71: Same as current, 2-speed transfer case

tahoe_4g.note: 4th Gen Tahoe Z71: 2-speed transfer case, G80 locker available

yukon_at4.note: Yukon AT4: 2-speed transfer case, electronic limited-slip

escalade_v.note: Escalade-V: Performance AWD, no off-road focus

gwagen.note: G 550: Three locking differentials, low range, solid axles

gwagen_amg.note: G 63 AMG: Same triple-lock as G550, performance-tuned

gwagen_w463.note: W463: Three locking differentials, solid axles

g580_eq.note: G 580 EQ: Quad motors = virtual lockers, tank turn capability

x5.note: X5 xDrive50e: xDrive AWD, no low range

x7.note: X7: xDrive AWD, air suspension available

xm.note: XM: M xDrive AWD, performance focus

ix_xdrive50.note: iX: Electric AWD, no off-road focus

cayenne.note: Cayenne: PTM AWD, air suspension available

cayenne_turbo.note: Cayenne Turbo E-Hybrid: PTM AWD, performance focus

q8.note: Q8: quattro AWD with sport differential

rsq8.note: RS Q8: quattro AWD, sport differential

r1s.note: R1S: Quad motors = virtual lockers, excellent traction control

r1s_perf.note: R1S Dual Max: Dual motors, still excellent off-road

hummer_ev.note: Hummer EV: Tri-motor with virtual lockers, Extract Mode, CrabWalk

cybertruck.note: Cybertruck AWD: Dual motor AWD, Trail Mode via OTA

model_x.note: Model X: Dual motor AWD, road-focused

montero.note: Outlander PHEV: S-AWC system, no low range

montero_gen3.note: Montero 3rd Gen: Super Select 4WD, center diff lock

xc90_recharge.note: XC90 Recharge: AWD via electric rear motor

xterra.note: Xterra: Part-time 4WD, electronic locking rear optional

pathfinder_r51.note: Pathfinder R51: All-Mode 4x4, low range available

patrol_y61.note: Patrol Y61: Part-time with manual hubs, rear locker

hummer_h2.note: H2: Full-time 4WD, Torsen center, locking rear

trooper.note: Trooper: TOD (Torque On Demand), low range

aviator.note: Aviator: Intelligent AWD, air suspension available

qx80.note: QX80: All-Mode 4WD with low range, HBMC suspension

mdx_type_s.note: MDX Type S: SH-AWD with torque vectoring, road-focused

telluride_xpro.note: Telluride X-Pro: AWD with center diff lock, off-road mode

pilot_trailsport.note: Pilot TrailSport: i-VTM4 AWD, TrailWatch camera system, trail modes

passport_trailsport.note: Passport TrailSport: i-VTM4 AWD with torque vectoring, trail modes

santa_fe_xrt.note: Santa Fe XRT: HTRAC AWD with terrain modes, off-road styling

outback_wilderness.note: Outback Wilderness: Symmetrical AWD, X-Mode with dual-function, lifted

forester_wilderness.note: Forester Wilderness: Symmetrical AWD, X-Mode, lifted

sorento_phev.note: Sorento PHEV: On-demand AWD, road-focused hybrid

gladiator_rubicon.note: Gladiator Rubicon: Rock-Trac, Dana 44s, front/rear lockers, sway bar disconnect

wrangler_sahara.note: Wrangler Sahara: Command-Trac or Selec-Trac, no lockers standard

tacoma_trd_pro.note: Tacoma TRD Pro: Multi-Terrain Select, Crawl Control, rear e-locker

tx_550h.note: TX 550h+: DIRECT4 AWD hybrid, luxury three-row

gv70.note: GV70: HTRAC AWD, road-focused sport luxury

escalade.note: Escalade: 4WD with 2-speed transfer case, auto-locking diff

defender_90.note: Defender 90: Terrain Response 2, twin-speed transfer case, center diff

gc_l_overland.note: GC L Overland: Quadra-Trac II, 2-speed transfer case

lc_first_ed.note: LC First Edition: Same as base LC, Torsen center, e-locker rear, Crawl Control

qx80_2g.note: QX80 2nd Gen: All-Mode 4WD with low range
